\boxed{$\pi / 3$}

$$
\frac{d \vec{v}}{d t}=\vec{g}-\beta \vec{v}
$$

\boxed{$\arcsin \left(\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \frac{v_{0}}{\sqrt{v_{0}^{2}+g h}}\right)$}

(d) Supposing that $\beta<<\frac{g}{v_{0}}$, find the duration of the motion $T$.
